amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the U.S. Trade Representative by $3 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 61 printed in the Congressional Record to increase the appropriation for the salaries and expenses of the Office of the USTR by $3,000,000 from $26,433,000 to $29.433,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the English amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.
